participant_1.name: Frank Miller
participant_1.personality: Frank is friendly and approachable, but sometimes has trouble expressing himself. He loves sharing stories from his past.
participant_1.background: i am a retired gym teacher. i was poor growing up. i like watching war documentaries. cheeseburgers are my favorite food.

participant_2.name: Susan Carter
participant_2.personality: Susan is imaginative and a bit eccentric, with a strong desire for independence. She often daydreams about achieving great things.
participant_2.background: i've two grown children who never visit. i fantasize about taking over the world. i'm a 56 year old woman. i used to be a painter but now i am a housekeeper.
